title: Assassin's Creed IV Black Flag Crack Only v8
description:
NOTE:
1. Fixed the v4 crack game progress hold on 0%
2. Fixed the game crash if you had too much save files in (save3dmgames) folder, 
   and now supported Main story and Aveline story save files in the same folder.
3. Now you have few options to choose on/off in saves.ini #1
4. Now you can run Single player mode & Multiplayer mode.
5. Crack and unlock the Aveline DLC in one file (uplay_r1_loader.dll)
6. Fixed bug and optimization. (DLC items unlock, Multiplayer mode crash...etc)
7. Fixed settings reset bug.

save3dmgamessaves.ini
Unlock Map=false (''true''-> Show All Map Markers)

[Option]
Unlock Other DLC=true
Unlock Map=false
Unlock Code Noir DLC=false
Unlock Aveline DLC=true
